title: Crime Alert 12.13.18

description:
Nuns swipe HALF A MILL to gamble, travel. Wandering, barefoot little boy alerts woman to call police to Huntsville double slaying scene. Family of gangster James "Whitey" Bulger plans wrongful death suit
